title: I called Mike McIntyre\'s office and got voice mail.  I left my name and number and a question as to if and when he wiould be having a town hall meeting on health care reform.  I also sent an e-mail.  No response in almost a week.  Can you find out if he is going to have any such meetings?  Thanks
text:
Our health reporter says there is nothing planned for our tri-county
area at this time in the way of town hall meetings. 

Thanks for using MyReporter.com
